content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/python/mypy.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image as a base
FROM python:3.11

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install build dependencies
RUN pip install -r build-requirements.txt

# Install main dependencies
RUN pip install -r mypy-requirements.txt
RUN pip install -r test-requirements.txt

# Run the test suite to verify the installation
RUN pytest
